prompts.deleteItem: Are you sure you want to delete this {{itemType}}? This cannot be undone.
prompts.inDev: This feature is still in development.
prompts.removeItem: Are you sure you want to remove this {{itemType}}?

errors.imageTooLarge: Image is too large. Maximum file size is 5MB.

prompts.alreadyRegistered: You have already created an account.
prompts.enterEmailForReset: Enter the email address associated with your account and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
prompts.logOut: Are you sure you want to log out?
prompts.passwordResetEmailSent: An email to reset your password has been sent. Please check your inbox for further instructions. If you don't see the email, don't forget to look in your spam folder.
prompts.removeSelf: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account? All of your data will be deleted and this cannot be undone.
prompts.removeUser: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this member's account? All of their data will be deleted and this cannot be undone.

errors.shortName: Username must be at least 2 characters
errors.shortDisplayName: Display name must be at least 4 characters
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long
errors.passwordTooLong: Password must be at most 64 characters long
errors.tooManyLoginAttempts: Too many login attempts. You may have been sent an email with instructions on how to reset your password.
errors.remove: There was an error removing this member.
errors.signUp: There was an error creating your account.
errors.update: There was an error updating your account.
errors.invalidResetPasswordToken: Password reset token is invalid or has expired.

errors.imageTooLarge: Image is too large. Maximum file size is 8MB.
errors.tooManyImages: You can upload a maximum of 5 images.
